main event: A civilian reported seeing one object the size of a dime that was blue-white in color, which then disappeared into the hills.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on May 6, 1956., The location of the sighting was Hollywood, California., The observation type was air visual., The object was estimated to be at an altitude of eight to ten thousand feet., The conclusion was that the sighting was probably an aircraft.
witness description: A script writer for movies, age unknown.
